author: jleroux
msg: A slightly modified patch from Sascha Rodekamp " Some improvements for the layer lookup" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3524) - OFBIZ-3524
A flag was added to fade the background behind the layered lookup (ie all the screen but the lookup) when a layer is opened.

author: robinanil
msg: Performance fix: Matrix in LDA was getting re-allocated for everydocument, added a reset code to reset/create the matrix values.
